description: The names used for this CustomResourceDefinition

categories.description: A list of grouped resources a CustomResource belongs to (e.g. '`all`'). Each entry must be a valid DNS label.

kind.description: The serialized `kind` of the resource. It is normally CamelCase and singular.

listKind.description: The serialized `kind` of the list for this resource. Defaults to '`kind`List'.

plural.description: The plural name of the resource to serve. It must be of format `plural.group` and it must be all lowercase. The value must be a valid DNS label.

shortNames.description: Short names for the resource.  It must be all lowercase and valid DNS labels.

singular.description: The singular name of the resource. It must be all lowercase and valid DNS label. Defaults to lowercased `kind`.
